scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f cjs -n tonal -o build/index.js -- lib/index.js
scripts.test: npm run modules-test && npm run test-facade
scripts.dist: npm test && browserify build/index.js > dist/tonal.js && uglifyjs dist/tonal.js -c -m -o dist/tonal.min.js && ls -hall dist/
scripts.test-ci: npm run modules-install && npm run test
scripts.modules-install: for d in ./modules/*/ ; do (echo "$d" && cd "$d" && rm -rf node_modules/tonal-* && npm i); done
scripts.modules-build: for d in ./modules/*/ ; do (echo "$d" && cd "$d" && rollup -c); done
scripts.modules-api: for d in ./modules/*/ ; do (echo "$d" && cd "$d" && jsdoc2md index.js > API.md); done
scripts.modules-test: for d in ./modules/*/ ; do (echo "$d" && cd "$d" && npm test); done
scripts.modules-outdated: for d in ./modules/*/ ; do (echo "$d" && cd "$d" && npm outdated); done
